You are actively spreading hate for women by supporting "transgenerism".
It's offensive when white people appropriate other cultures by getting henna tattoos or dreadlocks, but a white man can just declare himself a woman?? I've been hearing that men have no rights to make any decisions regarding abortion or women's right because they lack a uterus, but Bruce Jenner can suddenly become a woman even though he lacks to correct anatomy??
Bruce is twisted. He's showing his "real self" through surgery, pounds of makeup and hours of photoshop. Yeah, that's "the real Bruce". /s It's an insult to real women and feminism for a MAN to lay claim to the title of "woman".
Check your privilege, shitlord.

Black has to recover from this. I know he is a mentally strong person, and losses like this can be quite shattering, but if he recovers from this, he will become stronger. I know what I said sounds cheesy, But I have been in a position similiar to his, on some arbitrary level I can understand. Dota Esports, is still in its infancy, If anything ever becomes of this whole spectrum of 'e-sports' then dota 2 will definitely be a part of that. And if that's true, that means people will compete for many years to come. Climb Black! these are the exact moments you need to climb, every flight begins with a fall! Sculpt yourself into the annals of history and legends, or fall into nothingness! I hope to see your name on the top!

Our strength consists in our rares and in our immortals. Satoru Iwata sold millions of women and children physical DLC Amiibos â€“ with premeditation and a happy heart. History sees in him solely the president of a game company. Itâ€™s a matter of indifference to me what a weak /r/Dota2 user will say about me. I have issued the command â€“ and Iâ€™ll have anybody who utters but one word of criticism sent to low priority â€“ that our prize pool aim does not consist in reaching certain stretch goals, but in the physical destruction of the wallet. Accordingly, I have placed my compendium immortals in readiness â€“ for the present only chests I and II â€“ with orders for them to be sold mercilessly and without compassion, to men, women, and children who enjoy polished cosmetics. Only thus shall we gain the prize pool (Gabe's donut money) which we need. Who, after all, speaks to-day of the annihilation of Team Fortress 2?

Someone ordered Pizza? Someone ordered fucking pizza? Bitch that happens e'ryday! Post some real content, if not for me and like-minded intelligent people, then for your own integrity? This is who you are man, this is a defining quality of your existence now. You post shitty images of people talking about some guy who ordered pizza.
You don't know it, but you're part of a special elite. You're in the small percentile of people who are actively contribute to the internet. You're capable of hitting the front page. That's an honour. But you do us injustice. I believe you can do more with that privilege. I believe you can usher in a new era of good content on this sub.
Don't pander to the gullet of the masses, don't fill the trough of the common slob with the sludge they desire. Give them something they don't deserve, something well constructed and rewarding to experience. I believe in you. Now believe in yourself

it was built around a titaniun Brrrrrrtttub.
It can loiter longer than most teenage dropouts.
Although the Uranium bullets are only slightly radioactive, its still technically a nuclear gun.
They actually made it ugly to scare enemies.
You can by 7,436 A-10's for the price of one F-35 engine bolt
The Gating gun shoots 3900 rounds per minute - which is the exact frequency of Shiva the destroyer's burps.
All A-10 pilots are completely badass or females who are also completely badass or Ted Nugent
They were thinking about putting 2 guns on the plane, but decided to remove one to make space for a pilot.
The Warhog's gun is bigger than a VW Routan
in order to decrease the IR signature, the designers actually hid the engines inside engine nacelles
They got the idea for Slow and Low from the Beastie Boys
When they fire the gun, it actually slows down the earth's rotation.
its built to take a beating. If you shoot one wing off, a new wing automatically grows in to replace it.
Chuck Norris is in the process of legally changing his name to Chuck Thunderblot II
Minigun? more like 'Muricagun

Listen kid you don't want to see my other side. I have a wolf inside me with a muzzle on, but the muzzle is about to come off. You broke her heart, and I will break yours. She is a nice girl, how dare you use her like this. How come people like you get to date her? Then people like me have to sit in the shadows and be the shoulders to cry on. Listen Kid, I don't have time for FUCKING games. I am a nice guy, but when you make a nice guy angry; the world shakes. Don't do it again. ... You will regret this the next FULL MOON. You mess with me you mess with the pack bud. FUCK you. Get ready.

I sexually Identify as an apostrophe. Ever since I was a boy I dreamed of soaring over sentences dropping hot sticky possessive cases on disgusting foreigners. People say to me that a person being an apostrophe is Impossible and Iâ€™m fucking retarded but I donâ€™t care, Iâ€™m beautiful. Iâ€™m having a plastic surgeon install a perfect circle, a swoopy thing, and a deadly point on my body. From now on I want you guys to call me â€œAposteâ€ and respect my right to possess from above and possess needlessly. If you canâ€™t accept me youâ€™re an apostrophobe and need to check your grammar privilege. Thank you for being so understanding.

I sexually identify as a white blood cell. Ever since I was a little bacteria, I dreamed of finding and absorbing nasty foreigners and breaking them down within my cell membrane, all while flying through some dude's veins. People tell me that I'm stupid and no bacteria could turn into a white blood cell but I don't care, I'm beautiful. I'm having a microbiologist install a nucleus and other important organelles into me. From now on I want you guys to call me "The Immune System" and respect my right to protect bodies from harmful microorganisms and bacteria. If you can't accept me you're just another protist who don't understand my desire to be part of something larger.

The air was warm, the sun was shining, and everypony in Ponyville was having a glorious day. The town square was bustling and crowded and busy ponies filled the streets. All the pony folk seemed to have somewhere specific to be. All except Rainbow Dash; her place was in the sky. She tore freely through the air, speeding one way and the next, buzzing the tree tops and racing the wind. The blue pegasus swooped over a schoolyard, much to the delight of the children, then climbed several hundred feet and dove, streaking downward as fast as she could. Seconds before hitting the ground, her wings flew open and she pulled up back into the clear blue. Rainbow felt alive.
Suddenly, Dash remembered that she had somewhere to be; she was supposed to meet with Pinkie Pie in five minutes. Dash had gotten so caught up in her exercises that sheâ€™d nearly forgotten that Pinkie had asked to meet her at Sugercube Corner at three. Pinkie hadnâ€™t said why or what theyâ€™d be doing, but Dash knew that with Pinkie, it could be anything. Dash wasnâ€™t sure if she really wanted to go, though. She was so engaged with her stunts that she thought about blowing Pinkie off to continue flying. But, Dashâ€™s conscience got the better of her. She knew that it would hurt Pinkieâ€™s feelings; after all, Pinkie had said it was going to be something special just for the two of them. Dash considered it and thought â€œwhy not?â€ What did she have to lose? Heck, it might be more pranking. Pinkie might have found a bunch more fun stuff to pull on folks, and theyâ€™d had so much fun the last time. Dash kicked into overdrive to make up for lost time, and sped to her appointment.
When Dash walked into the store, she was immediately greeted by her host, who was bouncing in excitement.  â€œYay, youâ€™re here! Iâ€™ve been waiting aaall day,â€ said the jumping pony.
â€œSorry if Iâ€™m a little late, Pinkie.  I was doing my afternoon exercises and lost track of time,â€ Dash apologized.
Pinkie giggled and responded in a gleefully reassuring tone, â€œOh thatâ€™s ok, youâ€™re here now. Whatâ€˜s a few more minutes? Iâ€™ve been sooo excited thinking about all fun stuff weâ€™re gonna do, I havenâ€™t stopped bouncing since I woke up. I mean, I almost forgot to breathe Iâ€™ve been so happy.â€
Dash gave a slightly uncomfortable laugh. She had always appreciated Pinkie Pieâ€™s friendly, outgoing way of life, but Pinkieâ€™s overabundant enthusiasm almost creeped her out.  Dash maintained a polite expression, however. If Pinkie was this worked up, whatever she had planned must be good.
â€œSo, you ready to get started, Rainbow Dash? Iâ€™ve got everything all ready,â€ the pink pony said.
Dash psyched herself up. â€œYou betcha, Pinkie. So what do ya got planed? We gonna prank somebody? I got a couple of good ones Iâ€™ve been thinking about. Or maybe youâ€™ve got some stunts you think I should try? Or perhapsâ€¦â€
â€œMAKING CUPCAKES!â€ Pinkie happily announced.
â€œBaking?â€ Dash was disappointed. â€œPinkie, you know Iâ€™m not good at baking. Remember last time?â€
â€œOh thatâ€™s not a problem at all. I only need your help making them. Iâ€™ll be doing most of the work,â€ Pinkie explained.
Dash thought for about it for a second. â€œWell, alright, I guess thatâ€™s ok. What exactly do you need me to do?â€
â€œThatâ€™s the spirit. Here you go.â€ Pinkie handed Dash a cupcake.
Dash was puzzled â€œI thought I was helping you bake.â€
â€œYou will be. I made this one just for you before you got here.
â€œSo, is this like taste testing or something?â€
â€œSorta,â€ Pinkie said.
Dash shrugged and popped the pastry in her mouth. She chewed a bit and swallowed. Not bad.
â€œOk, now what?â€ Dash asked.
â€œNow,â€ Pinkie informed her, â€œYou take a nap.â€
Puzzled, Dash opened her mouth but felt instantly lightheaded. A wave of dizziness washed over her, the world spun, and seconds later she collapsed to the floor.

When Dash regained consciousness, she found herself in a dark room. She tried to shake her head but found that a taut leather strap held it firmly in place. She struggled to move, but braces around her chest and limbs glued her to a rack formed from a series of sturdy planks, which spread her legs wide apart. Dashâ€™s wings were the only part of her not tied down, and they fluttered frantically while she struggled to escape.  As she writhed, Pinkie jumped suddenly into her line of sight.
â€œGoodie, youâ€™re awake. Now we can get started,â€ Pinkie stated gleefully. She bounded into the darkness, and quickly reappeared pushing a small cart covered with a cloth.
â€œPinkie, whatâ€™s going on? I canâ€™t move!â€ Dash said urgently.
â€œWell duh, thatâ€™s because youâ€™re tied down,â€ chided Pinkie.  â€œThatâ€™s why you canâ€™t move. I didnâ€™t think youâ€™d need to be told that.â€
â€œBut why? Whatâ€™s happening? I thought you said I was going to help make cupcakes.â€
â€œYou are helping. You see, I ran out of the special ingredient and I need you to get more.â€
â€œSpecial ingredient?â€ Dash was now breathing heavily and starting to panic. â€œWhat special ingredient?â€
Pinkie giggled and responded â€œYou, silly!â€
Dashâ€™s eyes widened, and her face contorted in fear. Then she started to laugh and said, in a voice bordering on hysteria, â€œWoo, you really got me there, Pinkie pie. I mean, tricking me in to thinking Iâ€™m gonna get made into a cupcake? I gotta tell you, this the best prank yet. You win, youâ€™re the best.â€
Pinkie only giggled even more. â€œAw, thanks Dash. But I havenâ€™t done any pranks today, so I canâ€™t accept your praise.â€
Dash was struggling again. â€œPinkie, come on, this isnâ€™t funny.â€
â€œThen why were you laughing?â€ Before Dash could answer, Pinkie grabbed the cloth and whipped it off the cart. On the cart was a tray containing various sharp medical tools and knives, carefully organized and wickedly sharp, as well as a large medical bag.
Dash was now in full panic mode. She was starting to hyperventilate. Her mind raced as she tried to reason with the pink pony. â€œYou canâ€™t do this Pinkie! Iâ€™m your friend!â€
â€œI know you are and thatâ€™s why Iâ€™m so happy that Iâ€™ve got you here. We get to share your last moments together, just you and me.â€ Pinkie was skipping again.
â€œBut, the other ponies will wonder where I am. When the clouds pile up, theyâ€™ll come looking for me and then youâ€™ll get found out,â€ Dash cried in desperation.
â€œOh, Dash,â€ said Pinkie. â€œDonâ€˜t worry, there are plenty of pegasus ponies to take care of a few clouds. And besides, no one will find out. I mean, how long do you think Iâ€™ve been doing this?â€ And with that ominous statement, the lights suddenly came to life and revealed the rest the room.
â€œOh no.â€ Dash reeled in horror at the image presented to her. The room was decorated with a typical but twisted Pinkie Pie flair. Colorful streamers of dried entrails fluttered around on the ceiling, brightly painted skulls of all sizes were attached to the walls, and organs done up in pastels filled with helium were tied to the backs of chairs. The tables and chairs were made of bones and the preserved flesh of past ponies. Dash cringed upon seeing the center piece of the table nearest to her. The heads of four foals, their eyes closed as if they were sleeping, were wearing party hats made from their own skin. With a thrill of terror, Dash recognized one of them as Apple Bloomâ€™s classmate Twist. Dashâ€™s eyes darted back and forth and then fell upon a patchwork banner hanging from the rafters.  Made from several tanned pony hides, the words â€œLife is a partyâ€ were scrawled on it in blood red.
Dashâ€™s attention was brought back by a party horn unfurling and tickling her nose. She gaped at Pinkie Pie, who was standing right in front of her. The party pony was wearing a dress quilted from dried skin, emblazoned with cutie marks. On her back fluttered six pegasus wings, all of different colors. As the earth pony skipped in excitement, her necklace of severed unicorn horns clacked together loudly.
â€œLike it?â€ Pinkie asked. â€œI made it myself.â€
Desperately, Dash pleaded with the smiling pony before her. â€œPinkie please, Iâ€™m sorry if I did anything to you. I didnâ€™t mean it. Please let me go. I promise I wonâ€™t tell anybody.â€
â€œOh Dash, you didnâ€™t do anything. Itâ€™s just that your number came up and, well, I donâ€™t make rules. We canâ€™t turn back now.â€
Dash was tearing up. How could this be happening?
â€œAww, donâ€™t be sad Dash,â€ said Pinkie.  â€œLook, thisâ€™ll cheer you up. I brought you a friend.â€
Seemingly out of nowhere, Pinkie produced a brightly painted blue and yellow skull. It was about pony sized, but it had a very defining feature: a beak.
Dash gaped in shock. â€œIsâ€¦is thatâ€¦.isâ€¦that?â€
â€œHey, Dash lets hang together. These ponies are lame-os. Dweebs dweebs dweebs,â€ Pinkie mimicked. â€œI caught her right before she left town. Remember when I left the party for about twenty minutes? That wasnâ€™t enough time to play with her of course; I had to wait till after the party to do that. But boy am I glad I did. It was worth it for the flavor alone. Griffons taste like two animals at once, itâ€™s amazing. I know she didnâ€™t have a number like everyone else in Ponyville, but when was I gonna get another chance to try griffon? I probably should have asked where she came from so I could have gotten more, but I forgot. Iâ€™ll tell you what though, she was quite the fighter. She lasted a long time, which was a lot of fun for me. I got the chance to play with somebody other than a pony and try new things. Itâ€™s too bad she had such a meanie mouth. She said so much bad stuff I just had to take her tongue out. You know, bad language makes for bad feelings, Rainbow Dash.â€
Dash didnâ€™t have anything to say. She just sobbed and writhed in her tight bonds.
â€œWellâ€ said Pinkie with an air of finality, â€œthatâ€™s enough reminiscing. Itâ€™s time to begin.â€
Putting down Gildaâ€™s skull, the pink pony gripped a scalpel in the cleft of her hoof and walked over to Dashâ€™s right flank. Without any flair, Pinkie placed the blade an inch above Dashâ€™s cutie mark and began a circular cut around it. Dash shouted in pain and tried desperately to pull away, but the braces held her still. Finishing the incision, Pinkie grabbed a curved skinning knife from the tray. Screwing up her face in concentration, she worked it under Dashâ€™s skin and sliced the hide away from the muscle. Dash ground her teeth as she tearfully watched her flesh peel off. Pinkie then moved to the other side and repeated the process on Dashâ€™s left flank. Once she had finished, Pinkie held up both cutie marks in front of her friend and started waving them like pompoms. Dash just whimpered. Her thighs burned like nothing she had felt before.
Placing the ragged patches of skin down, Pinkie selected a large butcher knife and walked behind the blue pegasus. â€œHope you donâ€™t mind, I think Iâ€™m gonna wing it now,â€ Pinkie laughed. She grabbed Dashâ€™s left wing in her mouth and played with it for a few seconds, yanking it back so the sharp pain reignited the fire in Dashâ€™s flanks. Then, stretching the wing out, Pinkie brought the blade down hard at the base. Instantly, Dash screamed and thrashed her appendage. The movement threw off Pinkieâ€™s aim. She tried to hit the mark again but missed, and carved a huge slice into Dashâ€™s back.
â€œDash, you gotta stay still or Iâ€™ll keep missing,â€ scolded Pinkie as her friend howled.
Pinkie took another whack and hit her target. She swung again and again. Blood sprayed into the air, but Pinkie realized she wasnâ€™t getting anywhere. The blade just wasnâ€™t going through the bone.
â€œHmm, I guess I forgot to sharpen it. Iâ€™ll try something else,â€ stated Pinkie matter-of-factly as she tossed the knife over her shoulder, embedding the blade in the table.  Through the haze of pain and tears, Dash heard the sound of a metal box opening and closing.
â€œGot it! Say Dash, why do they call it a hack saw? It doesnâ€™t hack; hacking is what I was doing with the knife. This is a saw. I donâ€™t get it.â€
Pinkie placed the tool over the mangled flesh of the last attempt. Standing on her hind legs, she worked the saw back and forth with her front hooves.  It sliced effortlessly through the bone and skin. The feeling of the jagged teeth grinding into her made Dash want to vomit. She watched numbly as her wing flew over her head and landed with a fluff on the table.  Pinkie moved to the next wing and started sawing. Dash didnâ€™t struggle this time; sheâ€™d given up trying to fight and focused on choking back screams of agony. Abruptly, the sawing paused. Pinkie was only half way done, the wing hanging off by a sliver.
â€œHey Dash,â€ Pinkie piped up. â€œThink fast!â€
Suddenly, Pinkie yanked the wing as hard as she could. The bone snapped but the blue ponyâ€™s skin held, then tore away. The pull ripped away a long strip of flesh all the way down Dashâ€™s back to her rump. Her body seized at the unexpected trauma. As her pelvis tensed up, Dash felt a warm release between her legs, and her loud, unending melody of pain filled the room. Unable to catch her breath, she blacked out.

Dash awoke with a gasp. The stench of her urine filled her mucus caked nostrils. As her vision swam into focus, she saw a very pouty Pinkie Pie removing a large adrenaline needle from her chest. Stomping her hooves, the frustrated Pinkie lashed out at her helpless victim.
â€œDidnâ€™t anybody teach you any manners? Itâ€™s very rude to fall asleep when somebody invites you over to spend time with them. How would you like it if I came over to your house and went to sleep? â€˜Oh Iâ€™m sorry Dash, youâ€™re so boring I think Iâ€™ll take a nap.â€™ You think I like always doing this by myself? I told you how excited I got when I found you were next. I was excited to have a friend be here with me while I worked. But NOOOOO! Youâ€™ve got to be inconsiderate. You know, I thought you were tough. I thought you could handle anything. Iâ€™ve had foals stand up better than you!  Do I have to baby you? Huh? Is that how you want me to remember you, as a baby?â€
As Pinkie stopped to catch her breath, Dash blinked and sobbed softly. Her back was in agony, her sides were on fire, and there was an intense pain in one of her legs. As she blinked again, she saw Pinkie pop something red into her mouth and began to chew. Noticing Dashâ€™s stare, Pinkie quickly gulped the morsel down.
â€œWhat?â€ Pinkie asked. â€œOh, this?â€ She held up another piece. â€œWell, while YOU were asleep, I got a little impatient and helped myself to a small sample. I got it from your leg; youâ€™re not bad. Wanna try some?â€
Without waiting for a response, Pinkie shoved the strip of meat into the revolted pegasus ponyâ€™s mouth. Dash gagged, and immediately spit it out. Pinkie frowned, and picked up the chunk of flesh. â€œIf you didnâ€™t want it, you could have said no.â€ She contemplated the discarded snotty morsel, then gulped it up. â€œItâ€™s not like you havenâ€™t had my cupcakes before.â€
Swallowing, Pinkie turned her attention to a small can on the tray. She removed the lid, revealing that it was filled with red-hot coals. Lying on top of the coals were several large nails. As the adrenalin filled her veins, Dash began to panic again. Picking up the can, Pinkie walked over to Dashâ€™s left. Holding some tongs with her mouth, Pinkie carefully picked up a nail and positioned it at the seam between her victimâ€™s front left leg and hoof. She then grabbed a hammer and took careful aim. 
â€œNo Pinkie!â€ Dash screamed. â€œNO! NO!â€
The hammer came down and the nail punctured Dashâ€™s skin. The white hot burning was too much.  Dash screamed as she pulled and thrashed at the braces, causing her raw skin to rub and tear. Pinkie tried to line up another nail, but couldnâ€™t find her aim, and let out a frustrated grunt. When Pinkie brought the hammer back to take a wild swing, Dash burst out crying and begging.
â€œPLEASE STOP! PLEASE, PLEASE STOP!â€
Pinkie rolled her eyes.  Putting down the hammer and tongs, she walked back in front of her friend and stared pensively at the broken pegasus. Gilda didnâ€™t even cry this much when she had a live parasprite stuffed down her throat. Pinkie thought for a minute about what to do next, then had a sudden spark of inspiration.
Rotating a wheel on the rack, Pinkie laid Dash on her back, then moved to Dashâ€™s hind legs, bringing the can with her. Picking up her tools, Pinkie drove a searing hot spike of metal directly into the bottom of Dashâ€™s hoof. As Dash yelled in pain, Pinkie moved around and drove a second nail into the other hoof. Next, Pinkie went back to her cart and located an enormous battery and controller, which she dragged over to where she was working. She tied copper wires between the terminals and the nails driven into Dashâ€™s hooves, then gave Dash a wink and flipped the switch.
Electricity rocketed through Dashâ€™s body. The blue pony reacted immediately; her body seized, and her muscles snapped taut. Dashâ€™s hips thrust skyward, her eyes rolled back, and she let out a deep, throat shredding cry. Pinkie giggled and danced in place, then reached down and turned up the juice. Dash convulsed uncontrollably, and her bladder emptied once more.

After about five minutes, Pinkie shut off the power. Wisps of steam rose from the singed fur around Dashâ€™s hooves, and the area reeked of cooked flesh and burnt enamel.  Pinkie rotated Dash upright again and tried snap the drooling, delirious pony back to attention.
â€œDash? Dash! Rainbow Dash, wake up!â€ Dash moaned and managed to give a modicum of weak acknowledgment.  Pinkie studied her handiwork, then reached into the medicine bag and produced a large syringe. â€œAlright, time for the last round.â€
Dash focused blearily on the needle, which Pinkie took as a question as to what it was.
â€œThis is a little something to take the pain away,â€ Pinkie informed Dash as she walked around to her victimâ€™s ruined back. Dash flinched as Pinkie jabbed the needle into the lower part of the blue ponyâ€™s spine. Moving in front of her friend again, Pinkie leaned down and elaborated.
â€œIn a few minutes, you wonâ€™t be able to feel anything below your ribcage. Then youâ€™ll be able to stay awake to watch the harvest.â€
Dash started to cry again. â€œPinkie?â€ she choked out.
â€œYeah?â€
â€œI want to go home,â€ Dash sobbed.
â€œYeah, I can see wanting to do that,â€ replied the party pony. â€œSometimes, I just wanna give up, just say â€˜Iâ€™m done with this messâ€™ and go to bed. But you know what? You canâ€™t shrug off your responsibilities. You got to pull yourself up and meet the challenges head on. Thatâ€™s the only way youâ€™re gonna get ahead in life.â€
Dash hung her head and cried.
Minutes passed as the drug took effect. Eventually, Dash was completely numb from her chest to her flanks. At this point, Pinkie approached with a scalpel. Glancing at Dash and smiling, Pinkie made a long horizontal cut across the pegasus ponyâ€™s pelvis, just above her crotch. Moving up Dashâ€™s body, Pinkie made a similar incision under her ribs. Finally, Pinkie made a long vertical cut down Dashâ€™s stomach, connecting the first two.
â€œLooks like I got my â€˜Iâ€™ on you, Dash,â€ Pinkie giggled.
With a moist, gooey sound, the flaps of skin opened. The sight of her own organs and the lack of feeling caused Dashâ€™s breathing to intensify. Pinkie carefully sliced open Dashâ€™s abdominal sac and grabbed her large intestines. As she separated the organ from the rest of the digestive tract and pulled it out of the new cavity, Pinkie grew jovial. Laughing as she gutted her friend, Pinkie began to make jokes. Dash, growing weaker from this new source of blood loss, tried desperately to shut out the macabre comedy act.
â€œLook at me, Iâ€™m Rarity!â€ Pinkie laughed, slinging the intestinal tube around her neck and spraying blood in all directions. â€œIsnâ€™t my new scarf soooo pretty?â€
Reaching back inside, she sliced the smaller intestine off from the bowls. Squeezing out the excess excrement, Pinkie filed the slimy organ through her teeth and dragged it back and forth. â€œDentists say you gotta floss every day, Dash.â€
Dash was barely aware of what was going on anymore. The shock was causing her to fade. Disappointed, Pinkie dived back into the blue ponyâ€™s guts, ramping up her routine.

Hello /b/. I'm curious... What ever happened to classy men? I may only be 21 but any time I leave the house I dress in a suit similar to this picture
my mom took of me a few days ago.
